main event: Two huge red lights appeared suddenly over the horizon in Bedford, Virginia, and turned into a monster-like object that made sudden and erratic maneuvers.
interesting points: The lights were seen to make sudden and erratic maneuvers and at one point disappeared behind some trees.
The police were alerted but no one else reportedly saw the objects on this occasion.
The police reported that they could see nothing unusual on their sight finder or search radar.
There were reports of unusual objects from other houses in the area, and this was the third time the Bedford police had responded to such a report.
The report includes detailed meteorological data, including temperature inversions, which may have been relevant to the sighting.
sighted object: Two huge red lights that turned into a monster-like object
